title: September 11, 2077
body: Five are dead, 7 more are sick. Some are showing signs of unusual changes. They look like they are going through rapid aging. Really wish we had a doctor. No one wants to do anything anymore. I am frustrated because we can at least keep the power running in the dam. I am optimistic we will survive the fallout. Everyone else just sneers at me and tells me what's the point?
